objective: Integrate AI to help sales reps draft client follow-up emails that match company branding.

phases.name: Requirements & Design
deliverables: Define tone/style rules for AI-generated text

phases.name: Integration & Prompt Design
tasks: Connect CRM backend to OpenAI API
Add fallback logic for API errors or inappropriate output
acceptance_criteria: AI generates coherent and relevant draft emails

phases.name: Frontend & UX
tasks: Add 'Generate Email' button to CRM email editor
Track user edits for quality improvement
acceptance_criteria: Users can easily preview and edit AI-generated drafts

phases.name: Testing & Governance
tasks: Run user acceptance testing with sales team
Deploy feature with usage analytics tracking
